ygData.subject: Re: Banded armor and looks
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been looking for that cloak of leaves, but no one in game seems to have heard of it. Where did you find it? ... From: Dean Boyle  To:
ygData.messageBody:
I've been looking for that cloak of leaves, but no one in game seems to have
heard of it.

Where did you find it?

-----Original Message-----
From: Dean Boyle <gino_14@...>
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, June 10, 1999 4:41 PM
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Banded armor and looks


>From: Dean Boyle <gino_14@...>
>
>Well, I'm a Human Warrior with a full set of baned exept the cloakm I have
>the cloak of leaves and woven gloves. man, my guy looks awsome!
>
>
>----Original Message Follows----
>From: Mallachyte@...
>Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
>To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Banded armor and looks
>Date: Mon, 7 Jun 1999 21:27:58 EDT
>
>From: Mallachyte@...
>
>If it looks bad, you have the wrong race. On wood or dark elves, banded
>looks awesome! I haven't seen it on anything else, except for barbarians,
>who look like they aer wrapped in tin foil.
>
